name: g3d
description: webgl render engine compatible with both browser and gcanvas

scripts.website: mkdir ../_g3d_build_ && mv ./website/homepage ../_g3d_build_/homepage && mv ./website/playground ../_g3d_build_/playground && git co gh-pages && rm -rf ./* && mv ../_g3d_build_/homepage/* ./ && mv ../_g3d_build_/playground ./playground && rm -rf ./_g3d_build_

author: xieguanglei@hotmail.com
